beers.description: Maitake Mushroom Mild. 4.7% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts and Maitake Mushrooms that were foraged locally by Jean. Solely and thoughtfully hopped with UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast. Conditioned on malted chocolate milk balls and Montmorency cherries.
beers.summary: Maitake Mushroom Mild. 4.7% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts and Maitake Mushrooms that were foraged locally by Jean. Solely and thoughtfully hopped with UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast. Conditioned on malted chocolate milk balls and Montmorency cherries.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #23. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #23. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of vanilla flowers, orange zest, oyster crackers, and custard pie filling.
beers.description: Cream Ale. 5.4% Our Cream Ale brewed with flaked corn. Hopped thoughtfully in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented and lagered for many moons in stainless steel.
beers.summary:
Cream Ale. 5.4% Our Cream Ale brewed with flaked corn. Hopped thoughtfully in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented and lagered for many moons in stainless steel.
Notes of vanilla flowers, orange zest, oyster crackers, and custard pie filling.

beers.notes: Notes of guava smoothie, overripe passionfruit, fruit stripe gum, and juicy white peach.
beers.description: Holiday IPA. 6.8% Brewed with fluffy malted oats. Assertively hopped in the kettle with a new to us hop, Meridian, along with a dash of Citra. Then aggressively dry hopped with Meridian, Citra and Mosaic.
beers.summary:
Holiday IPA. 6.8% Brewed with fluffy malted oats. Assertively hopped in the kettle with a new to us hop, Meridian, along with a dash of Citra. Then aggressively dry hopped with Meridian, Citra and Mosaic.
Notes of guava smoothie, overripe passionfruit, fruit stripe gum, and juicy white peach.

beers.notes: Notes of sticky grapefruit pith, light toast, rose petal, sappy fir needles, and solidarity.
beers.description: Our contribution to Sierra Nevadas Camp Fire Relief program, to benefit those impacted by the devastating wildfires in Californias Butte County. Brewed in classic Sierra fashion with the glorious Cascade and Centennial hops, and fermented with the classic yeast associated with that brewery. Thank you, Sierra, for this initiative, and all of your pioneering efforts.
beers.summary:
Our contribution to Sierra Nevadas Camp Fire Relief program, to benefit those impacted by the devastating wildfires in Californias Butte County. Brewed in classic Sierra fashion with the glorious Cascade and Centennial hops, and fermented with the classic yeast associated with that brewery. Thank you, Sierra, for this initiative, and all of your pioneering efforts.
Notes of sticky grapefruit pith, light toast, rose petal, sappy fir needles, and solidarity.

beers.notes: Notes of never-ending weed fields, key lime custard, grilled pineapple and orange blossom honey.
beers.description: Single Hopped Double IPA. 8.0% Brewed with red wheat. Solely hopped in the kettle with a new to us hop, Eureka! Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast. Dry Hopped with an embarrassing amount of even more Eureka!
beers.summary:
Single Hopped Double IPA. 8.0% Brewed with red wheat. Solely hopped in the kettle with a new to us hop, Eureka! Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast. Dry Hopped with an embarrassing amount of even more Eureka!
Notes of never-ending weed fields, key lime custard, grilled pineapple and orange blossom honey.

beers.notes: Notes of tropical fruit chews, Italian lemon soda, zippy tangerine and underripe mango.
beers.description: Passion Fruit Saison 6.8% Brewed entirely with pilsner malt and thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Mittlefruh. Fermented in stainless with our magickal saison yeast. Then conditioned on heaps of passion fruit puree and dry hopped with Motueka.
beers.summary:
Passion Fruit Saison 6.8% Brewed entirely with pilsner malt and thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Mittlefruh. Fermented in stainless with our magickal saison yeast. Then conditioned on heaps of passion fruit puree and dry hopped with Motueka.
Notes of tropical fruit chews, Italian lemon soda, zippy tangerine and underripe mango.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon meringue pie, orange hard candies, Aperol spritz, and toasted coconut.
beers.description: Milkshake IPA. 7.2% Yuzu Milkshake is the latest heavily amplified psychedelic riff on THE boundary-pushing Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats and lactose sugar.  Conditioned atop of luscious Madagascar vanilla beans and exotic Yuzu juice. Intensely hopped and then dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra.
beers.summary:
Milkshake IPA. 7.2% Yuzu Milkshake is the latest heavily amplified psychedelic riff on THE boundary-pushing Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats and lactose sugar.  Conditioned atop of luscious Madagascar vanilla beans and exotic Yuzu juice. Intensely hopped and then dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra.
Notes of lemon meringue pie, orange hard candies, Aperol spritz, and toasted coconut.
